article:
:"Asthenia" redirects here. The [[tortrix moth]] [[genus]] is considered a
:[[junior synonym]] ofEpinotia.
{{Infobox symptom | Name = | Image = | Caption = | DiseasesDB = 22832 | ICD10 =

003174 | eMedicineSubj = | eMedicineTopic = | MeshID = D018908 | }}

'Weakness' is a symptom represented, medically, by a number of different
conditions, including: lack of muscle strength, malaise, dizziness, or
fatigue. The causes are many and can be divided into
conditions that have true or perceived muscle weakness. True muscle weakness is
a primary symptom of a variety of skeletal muscle diseases, including muscular
dystrophy and inflammatory myopathy. It occurs in neuromuscular junction
disorders, such as myasthenia gravis.
